About Momentum Partners

Our aim is to help you gain momentum in your property journey by partnering with you along the way. Simple as that. We listen to what you want, then help you get there with practical, honest, and impartial advice.

We know that sourcing and keeping on top of your lending can be a hassle, but it’s what we do best. With years of experience in the Banking sector, we know how to package your application for the financiers. We’re the I-dotting, t-crossing, and loop-jumping type; so you don’t have to be. We explore all options, then remove the grey area to help you feel confident about the best solution. Like a money-smart wingman - we’ve got your back.

Our founder Mo has extensive experience in lending. He has enabled first home buyers secure their dream home, assisted with securing complex multiple investment portfolios, and helped with commercial property purchases. Having spent the last five years working for a major bank, Mo has the inside scoop knowing what the banks require and is able to simplify that process for his clients.

Mo Olckers, CEO Momentum Partners

My desire to see my clients succeed means that I think outside the box and explore multiple scenarios to ensure the best outcome for my clients
Mo,
CEO, Momentum Partners

Ditching the constraints of corporate life in lieu of supporting, encouraging and enabling others on their property and investment journey. Mo purchased his first home at the age of 18 which ignited a passion for the property industry. He has owned multiple investments since, you can too.

To talk through how – get in touch!

More on Mo

When he is not working, you’ll find Mo spending time with his wife and two young daughters. He loves to barbecue or work on his latest renovation project.

What do you love? Let Momentum Partners focus on the lending details, so you can do more of that.
